info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON...NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 727 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Redbank Spring Campground, or 13 miles northeast of Newcastle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newcastle, Flag Mountain, Moon, Four Corners, Buckhorn, Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir, O`Neil Pass, Medicine Mountain, Redbank Spring Campground, Crooks Tower, Mallo Camp and Black Fox Campground. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
